item.title: Humanitarian workers detail challenges getting aid into Gaza despite ceasefire
item.description: Humanitarian workers said they will face many challenges delivering aid to Gaza including border restrictions and trying to access destroyed roads.

item.title: Which major airports are refusing to show DHS shutdown video
item.description: The roughly 30-second video began rolling out to airports last week, according to DHS.

item.title: 2 hikers hospitalized after encountering grizzly bear with 2 cubs on trail
item.description: Two hikers were attacked by a grizzly bear after they encountered the mother and her two cubs on a trail in Canada, authorities said.

item.title: WATCH: SpaceX launches 11th test flight of Starship mega rocket
item.description: SpaceX launched another of its mammoth Starship rockets on a test flight Monday, successfully making it halfway around the world.

item.title: WATCH: Gorilla smashes glass at San Diego Zoo
item.description: Eyewitness video captured the heart-stopping moment a gorilla rushed the glass at a viewing enclosure in the San Diego Zoo.
